The Post Meridian Radio Players Present - The Menagerie

July 18, 2025 at 8:00 PM

On July 18th, for one night only the Post Meridian Radio Players will reprise our Arisia 2025 Gender Swapped Star Trek performance of, \"The Menagerie\". Admission is free, with donations gratefully accepted. While not required, we encourage you to reserve your seat(s) in advance.

Reserve your seat

Both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages will be available for purchase at the cash bar in the back of the performance space. Candy, snacks, and PMRP merchandise will also be on sale before the show.

The show runs for approximately 1 hour with no intermission. House doors open at 7:30 PM to give time to buy or pick up reserved tickets, purchase refreshments, and find your seat before the show starts at 8 PM.

Directions Information and Accessibility

The Menagerie

In "The Menagerie," when Ms. Spock learns of a tragic accident involving her former captina, Christina Pike, she commandeers the Enterprise to return to the site of a past mission for mysterious reasons. What is there on Talos IV that is worth putting Spock's Starfleet career - and her very life - on the line?

Captain Jane T. Kirk, Survivor
Karen Sarao
Captain Christina Pike
Tori Queeno
Ms. Spock
Adria Kyne
Vina
Benedict Dawn-Cross
Ms. Tyler, Dispatch, Security Chief
